thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: James W Scott
thread.title_full: Dyers RV reviewed by James W Scott

author: James W Scott
title: James W Scott
text:
Dyers customer service was top notch in correcting my order that their drop ship warehouse picked wrong (twice!). It took a phone call (more than one) to their warehouse manager to finally assure that the correct items were pulled. By then we had lost so much time that the order was overnighted at no additional cost to me.
I will definitely use Dyers in the future
